Text: sorry, there are not 13 but 12 compositions!

Thanks a lot for this. The only track I really wanted was Broken Social Scene - Da Da Da, and you have it. It is the best track on the soundtrack IMO; by far.

Thanks, now I can finally put it on my Ipod!
Broken Social Scene - Da Da Da, best damn song to end a movie ever! Just brilliant. Half Nelson is a great movie, and Da Da Da was the most epic way to end a great film.
